Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content:
Excuse me but can anyone else on mainnet please confirm that the 
```
curl --url "http://127.0.0.1:7776" --data "{\"method\":\"walletpassphrase\",\"params\":[\"$passphrase\", 9999999]}"
```
call will return the same result for `$passphrase` = either your 24 seed words or compressed WIF ? I tested it on StakedNotary & testnet iguana, both return the same results for seed words & WIF attached to the same private key, but I'm not sure how it works on mainnet, I'm asking this question because I only use WIF atm üòÖ
